resources.string: Document has changes. Do you want to save them?
Error exporting to a temporary file
How do you want to save?
No sidecar annotation store available for this document
This bundle was exported from a different document (%1$s). Import into the currently open document (%2$s) anyway?
This PDF can’t be modified. Annotations are saved in the app. Use Share/Print to export an annotated copy.
To open Word documents (.docx/.doc), install OpenDroidPDF Office Pack or convert this file to PDF in another app, then open the PDF in OpenDroidPDF.
OpenDroidPDF Office Pack is installed, but it doesn’t match this app. Uninstall it and install the official Office Pack.
OpenDroidPDF Office Pack is installed, but Word conversion isn’t supported yet. Please update Office Pack.
OpenDroidPDF Office Pack currently supports .docx but not legacy .doc. Convert this file to PDF in another app, then open the PDF in OpenDroidPDF.
OpenDroidPDF Office Pack couldn’t convert this file. Convert it to PDF in another app, then open the PDF in OpenDroidPDF.
Couldn’t open another app for this file.
Imported Word document. Use Share/Print to export an annotated PDF.
This Word file was imported to a PDF for viewing and annotation. Saving back into the Word document isn’t supported. Use Share/Print to export an annotated PDF.
